heading: 3 dplyr Example 1
text: example select columns data frame common suffix
code:
library(dplyr)

# select columns that end with Width
my_query <- iris %>%
  select(ends_with("Width"))

# check
head(my_query)##   Sepal.Width Petal.Width
## 1         3.5         0.2
## 2         3.0         0.2
## 3         3.2         0.2
## 4         3.1         0.2
## 5         3.6         0.2
## 6         3.9         0.4

heading: 5 ggplot2 Example 1
text: example scatter plot color points mapped variable
code:
library(tidyverse)

# draw a scatter plot of mpg vs hp, colored by gear
mtcars %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x=mpg, y=hp, color=gear)) +
  geom_point()

heading: 7 gt Example 1
text: example add title subtitle using gt
code:
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)

head(mtcars) %>%
  gt()  %>%
  tab_header(
    title = md("Just a **title**"),
    subtitle = md("Just a `subtitle`")
  )
